verses.verse: And it came to pass in the sixth<WH8345> year<WH8141>, in the sixth<WH8345> month<WH2568>, in the fifth day of the month<WH2320>, as I sat<WH3427> in my house<WH1004>, and the elders<WH2205> of Judah<WH3063> sat<WH3427> before<WH6440> me<WH3027>, that the hand of the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069> fell there upon me<WH5307>.

And he brought<WH935> me to the door<WH6607> of the court<WH2691>; and when I looked<WH7200>, behold<WH259>, a hole<WH2356> in the wall<WH7023>.

So I went in<WH935> and saw<WH7200>; and behold<WH8403>, every form of creeping things<WH7431>, and abominable<WH8263> beasts<WH929>, and all the idols<WH1544> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, portrayed<WH2707> upon the wall<WH7023> round about<WH5439>.
